Job Title: Sanitation Technician (Sanitation Operator - Sanitation) Full Time - Newbern, TN 38059

Location: Newbern, TN

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
Job Details:

These positions start at $22.85/hr. with a shift increase for second and third shift and potential for overtime.  We have open positions for second shift and third shift starting at 7:00pm and 10:00pm that applicants may be considered for.

If you are looking to make an impact in a meaningful way, join us at Tyson Foods where we are raising the world’s expectations for how much good food can do!  We create quality products in a safe environment for our team members.  We offer great benefits and steady work. This facility operates five days a week and produces Sausage Patties, Sausage Links and Roll Sausage.

POSITION SUMMARY:

Responsible for breaking down equipment, cleaning, sanitizing work areas and setting up equipment for inspection and start-up, while also adhering to Core Safety, food safety policies, and company policies.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

Dry pickup area. Break down and set up equipment where needed. Use of high-pressure hose to rinse area and floor. Use of various chemicals to foam and scrub floor. Visually check area for cleanliness. Ability to work closely with Quality Assurance and USDA. Uphold the principals of SQF 2000. Work schedule will vary depending on production Perform various other tasks as assigned by Lead person, Supervisor or Superintendent. 

REQUIREMENTS:

PHYSICAL REQUIREMENTS: The successful candidate(s) must be willing and able to perform the physical requirements of the job with or without a reasonable accommodation.

Must be willing and able to work in temperatures less than or equal to 35 degrees Fahrenheit temperature for minimum of 8 hours. Ability to become certified in Tyson’s Lock Out/Tag Out program. Must be willing and able to pinch/grip product/equipment. Familiar with safe operation and use of high-pressure hoses and sanitation chemicals. Must be willing and able to perform the following task for periods of 8 hours on concrete floor, some of which may include but is not limited to bending, twisting, reaching, standing, stooping, walking, climbing, and lifting. Must be willing and able to lift/carry up to 50 pounds. 

Must have 3 months previous work experience with a single employer within the past 18 months.

This facility does not accept rehires.

Relocation Assistance Eligible:

No

Work Shift: 

ALL SHIFTS (United States of America)

Hourly Applicants ONLY -You must complete the task after submitting your application to provide additional information to be considered for employment.

Tyson is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will be considered without regard to race, national origin, color, religion, age, genetics, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or veteran status.

We provide our team members and their families with paid time off; 401(k) plans; affordable health, life, dental, vision and prescription drug benefits; and more.

CCPA Notice. If you are a California resident, and would like to learn more about what categories of personal information we collect when you apply for this job, and how we may use that information, please read our CCPA Job Applicant Notice at Collection, click here.

Experience Level (if available): None
